div1.p: allow witnesses 12 miles each S.C. Hyde
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss.
Territory of Washington, Plaintiff. vs. William C. Swartz defendant}.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, hold- ing terms at Cheney, Spo- kane County, in said Territory

To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting:
In the name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon James K. Ralph, Elizabeth J Ralph. C R Wells, A B Gillson, Margaret Miles, J Miles Benny Benningson, Mary Benningson, Alexander Redding, Samuel Heller to be and appear before the Hon. George Turner at chambers in Spokane Falls W.T. at the court house, in Cheney in said County, on the 14th day of August A.D. 1885 at 10 o'clock A.M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said plaintiff.

Witness the Hon. George Turner, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 12th day of Aug A.D. 1885 D.A. Clement Clerk. By Deputy

Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss.
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to each of them in said county on this 13th day of August A.D. 1885. E.F. Whittier Sheriff. By E.J. Hubbard Special Deputy
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, hold- ing terms at Cheney, Spo- kane County in said Territory
Territory of Washington Plaintiff. vs. William C. Swartz Defendant.
Returned and filed 14th day of August A.D. 1885 D.A. Clement Clerk. By Deputy
SHERIFF'S FEES Serving 10 names at 40 4.00 Mileage 42 miles at 10 4.20 Total, - - - - $8.20
